name: (2024) Premium High Arch Insoles for Ultimate Support - Plantar Fasciitis - Comfort for Foot Pain Relief - Anti-Fatigue - Orthotic Shoe Sole Inserts Men Women Standing All Day (Flame, XL)
about_this_item: Customize your fit: Ensure accurate shoe size verification and select the appropriate arch type that matches your foot's natural arch
Superior foot alignment: Orthotic inserts provide the necessary support for high arches, promoting proper foot alignment and alleviating plantar fasciitis pain
Improved balance and stability: Enhance your balance and stability during various activities such as running, walking, sports, or extended periods of standing with high arch insoles

Excellent shock absorption: Reduce impact on feet, knees, and joints with insoles designed for effective shock absorption. The deep heel cradle ensures stability and maintains correct foot alignment for greater comfort.
Compatible with multiple shoe type: Our orthotics for flat feet seamlessly integrate with different shoe styles, from athletic to formal, offering balance improvement for any occasion
Breaking-in Period: Pressure on the feet may be felt during the first 3-7 days. Start with 2-5 hours of wear daily, gradually increasing the duration
Shop with confidence: Enjoy a year of protection on your insoles, and reach out to us if you encounter any issues, even after trimming them
